text: Hans in Every Street () is a 1930 German crime film directed by Carl Froelich and starring Hans Albers, Camilla Horn, and Betty Amann.Bock & Bergfelder p. 10 A separate French-language version was also released. The film's sets were designed by the art director Franz Schroedter. ==Cast== == References == == Bibliography == * == External links == * Category:1930 films Category:1930s crime thriller films Category:German films Category:Films of the Weimar Republic Category:German crime thriller films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Carl Froelich Category:1930s chase films Category:Films about journalists Category:German multilingual films Category:Films set in Berlin Category:Films set in Switzerland Category:Films set in France Category:Films set on the French Riviera Category:German black- and-white films Category:1930 multilingual films
title: Hans in Every Street
